Source: inst/CITATION

Vissault S, Cazelles K, Bergeron G, Mercier B, Violet C, Gravel D, Poisot T (2019). rmangal: An R package to interact with Mangal database. R package version 2.0.2, https://ropensci.github.io/rmangal/.
